questions.question: What does CSS stand for?
Which property is used to change the background color in CSS?
Which CSS property is used to control the font size?
What does the 'float' property do in CSS?
options: Makes an element float in the container
Aligns an element to the left or right
Removes the element from the flow
questions.correctAnswer: Aligns an element to the left or right

questions.question: Which property is used to change the font family in CSS?
What does the 'z-index' property do in CSS?
options: Defines the stack order of elements
Specifies the width of an element
questions.correctAnswer: Defines the stack order of elements

questions.question: Which property is used to change the text color in CSS?
How can you make a list not display bullets in CSS?
What is the default value of the position property in CSS?
Which property is used to add space between elements in CSS?
Which CSS property controls the spacing between lines of text?
How do you center a block element horizontally in CSS?
What is the purpose of the 'box-sizing' property in CSS?
options: Defines how the width and height of elements are calculated
Changes the size of the border
questions.correctAnswer: Defines how the width and height of elements are calculated

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to create rounded corners?
Which property is used to set the space between characters in CSS?
What does the 'display' property do in CSS?
options: Defines how elements are displayed on the page
Sets the size of the element
questions.correctAnswer: Defines how elements are displayed on the page

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'opacity' property in CSS?
options: Defines the transparency level of an element
Controls the visibility of the element
questions.correctAnswer: Defines the transparency level of an element

questions.question: Which property is used to add shadows to text in CSS?
Which CSS property is used to control the width of an element?
Which property is used to display an element as a block in CSS?
What does the 'position' property do in CSS?
options: Defines how an element is positioned on the page
Controls the visibility of the element
Adds a border around the element
Sets the size of the element
questions.correctAnswer: Defines how an element is positioned on the page

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to make text bold?
Which property is used to set the height of an element in CSS?
What is the purpose of the 'flexbox' layout in CSS?
options: To create flexible and responsive layouts
To set the position of elements
questions.correctAnswer: To create flexible and responsive layouts
